name: The Guy Game Lite - Match 3 with pizza and beer
name_original: The Guy Game Lite - Match 3 with pizza and beer
description:
What do you get when you mix match 3 with farts, pizza, and beer? Possibly the most addicting and hilarious game ever. It's The Guy Game, an outrageous new puzzler from Rocking Pocket Games.

By day, Bob is a mild mannered business man. By night, Bob is a party animal and a typical male, watching football, going fishing, eating pizza, chips and hamburgers, drinking beer, playing video games, and using power tools. Your goal is to spend your entire monthly paycheck on as many male pass times as you can.

INSTRUCTIONS:
Arrange the items so there are 3 in a row to take them to the checkout. Watch out for sales where you can get items for 25% or 50% off. 4 items in a row will make a mega-fart bowl of beans. 5 items in a row will make a mega-burp root beer float.

If you use all your credit, the bank will offer you more at the end of the month. If you run out of moves your credit will be reduced. Every month you will get paid and replenish your funds, but lose too often and your career will be in the toilet!

FEATURES:
- High score for the highest number of items bought
- Outrageous sound effects!

A sense of humor is required!
